instructions.title: Tap to Color
instructions.description: Simply tap on any area of the drawing to fill it with your selected color. It's that easy!

instructions.title: Choose Your Palette
instructions.description: Select from our beautiful color palettes or create your own custom combinations.

instructions.title: Undo & Redo
instructions.description: Made a mistake? Use the undo button to go back, or redo to restore your changes.
